Movie & Dining: Get a 20% discount on movies and buy 1 get 1 free offer (BOGO) on movie tickets through BookMyShow. You get a complimentary EazyDiner Prime membership.
Rewards Rate: 1 Reward Point for every Rs. 100 you spend on domestic purchases. 3 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 you spend on international purchases.
Reward Redemption: Redeem Points for Airmiles 1 RP = 1 Airmile. For Cash 1 RP = ₹0.75
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited Free Domestic Airport Lounge Access
International Lounge Access: 2 complimentary international lounge access per quarter
Golf: 3 Complimentary Golf Games & Golf Lessons Each Month
Insurance Benefits: You get insurance coverage for an air accident, lost/delayed baggage, lost passport/ticket, missed connection, etc.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on spending Rs. 10 lakhs or more in the last year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver across all fuel stations.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the cash withdrawn or Rs. 300 (whichever is higher)

product_details: Get up to 3 Reward Points per ₹100 spent using your IndusInd Bank Celesta Credit Card.
Reward Points redeemable against Cash credit.
Vouchers worth ₹25,000 each from Oberoi Hotels & Montblanc as a welcome gift.
Buy 1 get 1 free (BOGO) offer on movie tickets.
Unlimited complimentary domestic airport lounge access and 2 international lounge access per quarter with the Priority Pass membership
Complimentary Tablet Plus membership with access to VIP privileges and benefits
Complimentary golf lessons and golf games every month.
